cocktails.name: Mezcal Fun
ingredients: a couple of sprigs of thyme
cocktails.description: Cut a lime wedge to wet the rim of your cocktail glass. Then, dip the rim into a bowl of worm salt. In a shaker, pour in mezcal and lime juice. Shake for 10 seconds. Pour into a salt-rimmed and ice-filled cocktail glass. Top off with blood orange soda and sparkling water. Garnish with a slice of blood orange and a couple sprigs of thyme.
cocktails.author: Lisa

cocktails.name: Gingerbread House
cocktails.description: Mix the rum, triple sec, masala syrup and lemon juice in a shaker with a couple of ice cubes. Shake 15 seconds. Strain and pour over ice. Fill the rest of the glass with coke.
cocktails.author: Ioan

cocktails.name: Blueberry Lime Gin & Tonic
cocktails.description: Smash the blueberries in a tall glass. Add ice, gin, top with tonic water, squeeze lime juice and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge and mint leaves.
cocktails.author: Vlad

cocktails.name: Amaretto
cocktails.description: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Add the ice and mix, then pour into a glass over fresh ice. Garnish with pineapple slices.
cocktails.author: Paula

cocktails.name: Tonic Compote
cocktails.description: Mix the ingredients in the shaker and shake them. Strain the mix and pour it into a cocktail glass over the ice. Top it off with tonic water.
cocktails.author: Mada

cocktails.name: Rose Sangria
cocktails.description: Pour the wine, grapefruit juice, bourbon and Chambord into a pitcher. Stir until the honey dissolves (if the honey is too thick, heat it beforehand). Add the watermelon scoops and the strawberries. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours. Take it out of the fridge and add more honey if needed. Before serving, add the raspberries.
cocktails.author: Marcela

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.description: Put ice in a whiskey glass, then add the vodka and liqueur. Top it off with your favorite white, then mix lightly.
cocktails.author: Alex

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini - to last untill 00:00
cocktails.description: Mix the ingredients in the shaker and shake them. Pour into a Martini glass. Add whipped cream. Decorate with mint leaves and grated dark chocolate.
cocktails.author: Irina

cocktails.name: Strawberry Mojito
cocktails.description: Put the strawberries and lime slices in a tall glass. Add the simple syrup and muddle lightly. Slap the mint leaves and put them in the glass. Add rum, then crushed ice and mix. Top off with water and some ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, mint leaves and a nice strawberry.
cocktails.author: Didi

cocktails.name: Tornado
cocktails.description: Pour 2 dashes of angostura bitters and 4-5 of angostura orange bitters over 2 cubes of brown sugar and 2-3 mint leaves. Muddle everything together. Add the rum and lemon juice. Shake well with 3-4 ice cubes. Pour in a whiskey glass over a large cube of ice.
cocktails.author: Iza

cocktails.name: Ciocolate Orange Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: Mix the espresso shot, ice cubes, vodka and coffee liqueur in the shaker. Pour into a martini glass. Grate the orange chocolate on top.
cocktails.author: Cata

cocktails.name: Baijiu Tonic
cocktails.description: Mix the baijiu and tonic water into a Collins glass, squeeze the lime on top and drop it into the glass. Stir with a straw.
cocktails.author: Dan

cocktails.name: Cranberry Sparkler
cocktails.description: In a highball glass, filled with ice, add cranberry juice and lime juice. Top off with club soda. Garnish with orange wheel.
cocktails.author: LoveToKnow

cocktails.name: Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri
ingredients: 1 and a half cups cracked ice
cocktails.description: Chill a margarita or cocktail glass. In a blender, add cracked ice, strawberries, lime juice, and simple syrup. Blend until desired thickness. Pour into chilled glass. Garnish with whole strawberry.
cocktails.author: LoveToKnow
